Case 18-cr-610 (JMF) Document 82 Filed 07/18/19 Page 33 of 33

Conclusion & Order

Based upon the foregoing, the Government's motion for remand (detention) is granted and the Defense motion for pretrial release is denied.

Dated: New York, New York July 18, 2019

RICHARD M. BERMAN, U.S.D.J.

33
DOJ-OGR-00000816
